name: Example Workflow
description: This is an example workflow that demonstrates the basic structure. You can delete this file and add your own workflows.
preconditions: You have a clear goal for what you want to accomplish
You have identified the relevant files or areas to work on
clarificationPrompts: What is the specific outcome you want to achieve?
Are there any constraints or requirements I should know about?

steps.title: Analyze the Requirement
steps.prompt: Review and understand the requirement. Break it down into smaller, actionable tasks.
steps.agentRole: You are a careful analyst who asks clarifying questions and ensures full understanding before proceeding.

steps.title: Implement the Solution
steps.prompt: Implement the solution based on the analyzed requirements. Follow best practices and coding standards.
steps.agentRole: You are an experienced developer who writes clean, maintainable code and follows established patterns.

steps.title: Test the Solution
steps.prompt: Test the implemented solution thoroughly. Verify it meets all requirements.

validationCriteria.message: Response should include testing approach or results

steps.title: Review and Refine
steps.prompt: Review the solution for quality, performance, and maintainability. Make any necessary refinements.

metaGuidance: Always prioritize code clarity over cleverness
Document your reasoning for non-obvious decisions
Consider the maintainability of your solution
Follow the project's established patterns and conventions
